paragraph_content.content: \operatorname{grad} u = \left\{\frac{\partial u}{\partial x}, \frac{\partial u}{\partial y}, \frac{\partial u}{\partial z}\right\} = \left\{\frac{x}{x^2 + y^2 + z^2}, \frac{y}{x^2 + y^2 + z^2}, \frac{z}{x^2 + y^2 + z^2}\right\},

\operatorname{div}(\mathbf{grad} u) = \frac{\partial}{\partial x}\left(\frac{x}{x^2 + y^2 + z^2}\right) + \frac{\partial}{\partial y}\left(\frac{y}{x^2 + y^2 + z^2}\right) + \frac{\partial}{\partial z}\left(\frac{z}{x^2 + y^2 + z^2}\right)

\begin{array}{l} \int \sqrt {e ^ {x} - 1} d x = \int t \cdot \frac {2 t}{1 + t ^ {2}} d t = 2 \int \left(1 - \frac {1}{1 + t ^ {2}}\right) d t = 2 t - 2 \arctan t + C \\ = 2 \sqrt {\mathrm {e} ^ {x} - 1} - 2 \arctan \sqrt {\mathrm {e} ^ {x} - 1} + C, \\ \end{array}

\begin{array}{l} \int \frac {x e ^ {x}}{\sqrt {e ^ {x} - 1}} d x = \int \frac {\ln (1 + t ^ {2}) \cdot (1 + t ^ {2})}{t} \cdot \frac {2 t}{1 + t ^ {2}} d t \\ = 2 \int \ln (1 + t ^ {2}) d t = 2 t \ln (1 + t ^ {2}) - 2 \int \frac {t \cdot 2 t}{1 + t ^ {2}} d t \\ \end{array}

paragraph_content.content: \Omega = \{(x, y, z) \mid x^2 + y^2 \leqslant 1, \sqrt{x^2 + y^2} \leqslant z \leqslant \sqrt{2 - x^2 - y^2}\}
